SCURRYING.Definition: (of a person or small animal) moving quickly with short quick steps

‍STEP AHEAD OF THE GAME.Definition: to already be in advantage, to already be already prepared

‍BOOM TIME.Definition: a period in which there is a surge of prosperity for a person, place, or industry

‍MANICALLY.Definition: (informal) in a busy, excited or anxious way

‍INTANGIBLE.Definition: difficult or impossible to define or understand; vague and abstract

‍ASPIRATIONAL.Definition: desirable, having or showing a desire to achieve a high level of success or social status

‍EMPOWERING.Definition: make (someone) stronger and more confident, especially in controlling their life and claiming their rights

REINFORCES.Definition: strengthen (an existing feeling, idea, or habit)

‍PRICE TAG.Definition: the ticket on a piece of clothing that shows the price

‍CONGLOMERATE.Definition: large collection of brands or companies

‍VARNISH.Definition: a liquid used to protect wood, metal, or other materials

‍SEALANT.Definition: a liquid used to stop liquid getting into material

‍TIN.Definition: an airtight container made of tinplate or aluminium

‍SELF-DEPRECATION.Definition: modest about or critical of oneself, especially humorously so

‍IMPLICATION.Definition: the conclusion that can be drawn from something although it is not explicitly stated
